title: #336 AMERICA BUILT ON SLAVERY DEBUNKED! Ralph Macchio and HodgeTwins | Louder With Crowder
description: Talking all things Trump on the NFL, Kim Jong, Germany’s new insane migrant program, angry Frontier passengers, 30-year-old bums and more! We debunk the assertion that America was “built on slavery” and Ralph Macchio stops by along with Martin Kove to talk Karate Kid and Cobra Kai and in the last hour, the HodgeTwins swing by for their usual shenanigans.
